title: US Stock Futures Fall on Apple Warning, Gold Up: Markets Wrap
description: US equity-index futures fell at the open as Apple Inc. warned about margins and doubts grew over whether heavy investment in artificial intelligence will deliver sufficient returns.
content: US equity-index futures fell at the open as Apple Inc. warned about margins and doubts grew over whether heavy investment in artificial intelligence will deliver sufficient returns.
